entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 8:56 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
